item.title: Trump pardons former Virginia sheriff convicted of bribery, fraud
item.description: Former sheriff Scott Jenkins was found guilty of accepting more than $75,000 in bribes.

item.title: On Memorial Day, Trump honors fallen soldiers and celebrates political wins
item.description: Trump’s Memorial Day speech delivered an explicitly partisan message during what is traditionally a nonpolitical commemoration of the nation’s fallen ...

item.title: Charles Rangel, powerful voice for Harlem in Congress, dies at 94
item.description: He became the first African American chairman of the House Ways and Means Committee but was forced to relinquish that coveted position because of fina...

item.title: Democratic troubles revive debate over left-wing buzzwords
item.description: From “intersectionality” to “equity,” many say jargon is alienating key voters. But progressives say inclusive language is vital.

item.title: Trump says he will delay tariffs on European Union until July 9
item.description: Trump said that he and the Europeans intend to “rapidly get together and see if we can work something out.”
